thread.title: Qualcomm sinks after Trump blocks deal

title: Qualcomm sinks after Trump blocks deal
text:
Qualcomm sinks after Trump blocks deal 4:01pm EDT - 01:46 
Qualcomm stock dropped after President Trump blocked microchip maker Broadcom's proposed takeover of Qualcomm on national security grounds, ending what would have been the technology industry’s biggest deal ever. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
